pub_exit.title: Leaving the Pub
pub_exit.text: You stumble out of 'The Wobbly Duck' pub, feeling pleasantly buzzed. The cool night air hits your face as you realize you need to get home. You see two paths ahead.

choices.text: Take the shortcut through the park

park_entrance.title: The Dark Park
park_entrance.text: The park looks eerily quiet at night. A jogger runs past, giving you a strange look. You hear rustling in the bushes nearby.

main_road.title: The Busy Street
main_road.text: Cars zoom past you on the main road. You spot a late-night food truck with a long queue of drunk people. Your stomach rumbles.

bush_investigation.title: The Mystery Revealed
bush_investigation.text: You push through the bushes and find... a very confused hedgehog wearing a tiny hat! It looks at you judgmentally before waddling away. You feel oddly proud of your detective skills.

park_path.title: The Sensible Route
park_path.text: You wisely ignore the mysterious sounds and continue on the path. A couple walks by holding hands, making you feel slightly lonely but also relieved you didn't end up in a horror movie scenario.

choices.text: Sit on a bench and contemplate life
Speed up to get home faster

food_truck.title: Midnight Munchies
food_truck.text: The food truck owner, a cheerful man named Gary, serves you the most amazing kebab you've ever tasted. 'Secret ingredient is love!' he winks. You feel energized and ready for anything.

hedgehog_adventure.title: An Unlikely Guide
hedgehog_adventure.text: The hedgehog leads you to a hidden garden behind the park. There's a small gathering of people having a midnight poetry reading. The hedgehog sits in the front row like a regular attendee.

gary_wisdom.title: Life Lessons from a Kebab Master
gary_wisdom.text: Gary tells you: 'Life is like a kebab, my friend. Sometimes you get the good bits, sometimes you get the salad you didn't ask for, but it all comes together in the end.' You feel strangely enlightened.

choices.text: Ask to work at the food truck
Thank him and head home with new perspective

poetry_night.title: Unexpected Artistry
poetry_night.text: You find yourself reciting a poem about your pub experience. The crowd loves it! The hedgehog even claps with its tiny paws. You've discovered a hidden talent.

career_change.title: A New Beginning
career_change.text: Six months later, you're running your own food truck called 'The Philosophical Kebab.' Gary is your business partner, and you serve wisdom with every meal. Life took an unexpected turn, but you're happier than ever.

home_arrival.title: Finally Home
home_arrival.text: You arrive at your front door, keys in hand. As you look back at the path you took, you realize that sometimes the journey home teaches you more about yourself than the destination ever could.

residential_area.title: The Home Stretch
residential_area.text: You're getting close to home now. The familiar streets make you feel nostalgic about your evening adventure.

final_choice.title: One Last Decision
final_choice.text: You stand at the corner near your house. You can see your bedroom light is still on - did you leave it on, or is someone there?

mystery_ending.title: The Surprise
mystery_ending.text: You sneak up to your window and peek in. Your cat is sitting on your desk, having somehow turned on the lamp. It stares at you through the window with that judgmental cat look that says 'You're late, human.' You laugh and head to the front door.

choices.text: Go inside and pet your cat
